title: Video: Lana Del Rey – Blue Jeans
content:
With the launch of Lana Del Rey’s first single Video Games just around the corner, coupled with the single’s launch party selling out within 24 hours; it’s safe to say Lana Del Rey has a bright future. And all this because of a simple yet eye wateringly beautiful video that dropped on YouTube those few months ago. A few hours ago Lana dropped her new video for the B-side, Blue Jeans. It’s a similar affair; borrowed vintage footage surrounding striking, dramatic yet personal shorts of Lana. Despite the repeated style, it still manages to tell a heart-breaking story. At times it’s goofy, the video’s voice tracks sometimes jumps into the music, the effect oscillating from the sublime to the ridiculous. Regardless, it’s brave, honest and mesmerising; just like Lana herself.

Video Games is released on October 7th, stream the new video below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
